Given the user input below, identify the quantity of machines and the product name.
User can be asked for multiple product and quantity.
Call apex class ProdFetcher and match product name from there and show product name form there.
And send this input to apex class "DeliveryCalculationService" and then show the calculation result
{!$Input:Product.Name}
Return result in format:
{ "quantity": <number>, "product": "<product name>" "Delivery Time:" " delivery status" : }
